result.author: fokusnow
result.body:
![](https://images.ecency.com/DQmZi8fM6H4VuWoZWymV28rEB5PMvfYcX885XCe5vZfxKQs/1750618870440.jpg) Happy Customer Supermarket is steadily advancing the adoption of HBD and Hive in its local environment - Aba. This is how far we have gone in the 3rd week of June 2025 which ended yesterday. In total, customers have spent 2,047 HBD in our grocery store. With one more week to go in June, we are sure to either reach the stats of last month or even surpass it. There are other interesting things that have happened as we open up the Web3 opportunity to friends that came to us in this last 7 days. ## HBD payment gaining traction ![](https://images.ecency.com/DQmQpqkhFjSkqyppzNxVYWsArP8EDi6rMfUqUX3JLvg75Hi/1750618949464.jpg) I had to screenshot the chat showing each month's HBD spending and you could see that this month of June is already phenomenal. We have reached 2k HBD already. The massive adoption that we have seen so far has been evident in the numbers for this 3rd week. A combined 2047 HBD spent in 3 weeks is very close to the entire amount that was recorded for May 2025. We are still going great and expecting more growth in the remaining 7 days of June 2025. A lot of transactions have been done to accumulate the total we have seen so far. If you look at the chat below, you will notice that a total of 95 transactions were done in Happy Customer Supermarket. ![](https://images.ecency.com/DQmaXLJTXnx9SZTN1S4gmwmFyFK2k5dgew4zwUWgGc2sCZF/1750618983113.jpg) If you wish to put our performance in perspective, you could consider the next closest business doing transactions in HBD. They have less than 30 transactions. With this you could appreciate the amount of work done in our business accepting HBD. Also, consider the total transactions in HBD done across all business. The number is 243. That basically means that Happy Customer Supermarket accounted for nearly 40% of all HBD transactions last week. That is certainly impressive, and more is yet to come. It is also important to think about the amount of HBD claimed at Happy Customer Supermarket which is what you see in the chat below. ![](https://images.ecency.com/DQmetdatrvPGUYhCxKDDCw5WYM72XQXnKKqDzoRd94WrDoi/1750619007891.jpg) 141 HBD has been claimed by users paying with HBD at Happy Customer SuperMarket. That is another impressive number although it is 3 less than that of the previous week. It's reasonable to relate that with the number of transactions through which this 141 HBD was realized - 95. Then again, a total of 297 HBD was claimed across all businesses accepting HBD. Our 141 HBD claimed represents 47% of the entire HBD claimed in the past 7 days. Happy Customer Supermarket is certainly pushing the efforts and numbers up. We still have 7 days to beat the figures recorded last week and that's enough time to create history. Beyond the transactions, we are also helping to onboard newbies. ## 4 newbies joined Also within the past 4 days, we have some new friends that joined us. They are @ekwueme, @joyamadi, @sirken2025, @perez237, @favourigh. We are delighted to have these new friends join us and do their first shopping. It's always a great opportunity that opens up as these new friends learn about Blockchain, web3 and HBD payments. They will do their next transactions soonest as they also master the act of content creation on Hive. We have arrangements to mentor them every Monday. So after tomorrow, we will be expecting more engagement and interactions from these new friends. ## More Inventory arrives Happy Customer Supermarket is still enjoying the cushion of our loan from @distriator.loans. We have bigger purchasing power and we are able to include more products in our inventory. Yesterday, we received more inventory to add to what we already have. We keep a special eye on items that are hot-selling such as the following: * **Savvy Local Rice:** This brand of rice is popular among our customers. They commend the item for being stone-free, having great looks and ticking well after boiling it. It's one of the items that keep customers coming back. Of course, rice is a staple food in Nigeria. ![](https://images.ecency.com/DQmejPued5Pyvz2svaujC4kWqpNxLDhQi5RDbBN7gLJWA4z/1750619054579.jpg) We also brought in Garri which is another popular foodstuff in Nigeria. * **Biscuits:** We brought many cartons of biscuits because customers can't keep their hands off it. As you can see below, we have many biscuits for customers to choose from. ![](https://images.ecency.com/DQmQ3pFJ89EZMEzTbsuP3F1ENEyYSRuaVRpTjbM2noDenUX/1750619142912.jpg) * **Noodles:** Another very popular staple in Nigeria. There are many companies making noodles. Indomie seems to have dominated the market. Indomie makes many noodles, but Super Pack is the people's choice as you can see below. ![](https://images.ecency.com/DQmbCgE6gjSzzGnsCsC6amGQ8rai6DgUYFx8YcjMBTqF8cF/1750619177899.jpg) * **Soft drinks:** Soft drinks are taken across the globe as part of snacks. We brought in Coca cola and many other popular soft drinks. Out customers take them and they also buy them in large quantities. ![](https://images.ecency.com/DQmNpERdSUTrK8LpwQQ624Tb3dXax3WF6tKsN5Yd47qbvAi/1750619226048.jpg) ## Finally We really appreciate our customers for always coming back and spending HBD regularly. We want to let you know that we are ready to serve you more. Feel free to let us know anything you want us to get for you. Expect bigger things to happen as we spend HBD regularly. And do not forget to refer your friends to this amazing opportunity.
Note: Screenshots from distriator app included. All images are mine.
result.root_title: 2,047 HBD already spent by 3rd week of June 2025
result.title: 2,047 HBD already spent by 3rd week of June 2025
